original_title: ノストラダムス戦慄の啓示
overview: The main theme is "the battle between light and darkness" that takes place on the earth, but individual stories on the following themes progress and contains: Evil thoughts and global consciousness, The secret of the spirit world, Structure, Angels, Reborn System, Aliens and UFOs, Law of Salvation and El Cantale.
title: The Terrifying Revelations of Nostradamus
